artist: Artist: Utagawa Kuniyoshi; Author: Mōri Narimoto
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
poem on right sheet: 梓弓はるの　あやめも　わかぬ夜に　ねらひよつたる　梅の花の香　柳花園瑞垣 {Azusayumi haru no ayame mo wakanu yo ni nerai yottaru ume no hana no ka, Ryūkaen Mizugaki}; poem on left sheet: 肌は雪　裾野はみとり　声いろは　おやに似たりし不二のやまとや　
　柳桜亭花也 {Hada wa yuki susono wa midori kowairo wa oya ni nitarishi fuji no yamatoya, Ryūōtei Hananari}
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink and color on paper
signed: on each sheet: 朝櫻楼国芳画 {Chôôrô Kuniyoshi ga}
title: Actors Onoe Kikugorō III as Yorimasa (R) and Iwai Kumesaburō II as the Nue Monster (L)
